aircraft.value: Raptor Elite - AC-9455-528 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Oil consumption rate increase. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 26/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 27/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 30/04/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 02/05/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 01/05/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
